sentences.en: An attempt was then made to dive the sump.
sentences.cn: 之后曾尝试潜入污水坑。

sentences.en: Children always dive to the bottom of a subject.
sentences.cn: 孩子们对问题总是追根究底的.

sentences.en: Dinner's ready. Dive in, everybody!
sentences.cn: 饭已备好,开始吃吧, 伙计们!

sentences.en: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.cn: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

sentences.en: If we cut interest rates, the pound would dive.
sentences.cn: 如果我们降低利率，英镑就会大幅贬值。

sentences.en: Joanne had just learnt to dive.
sentences.cn: 乔安妮刚学会跳水。

sentences.en: She was standing by a pool, about to dive in.
sentences.cn: 她站在水池旁边，正要往里跳。

sentences.en: Stock prices took a dive.
sentences.cn: 股价暴跌。

sentences.en: Thankfully, the pilot managed to pull out of the dive and regain control.
sentences.cn: 幸亏驾驶员设法将俯冲的飞机拉起，恢复了对飞机的控制。

sentences.en: The aircraft appeared to dive vertically towards the crowd.
sentences.cn: 飞机似乎垂直朝着人群俯冲下来。

sentences.en: The first time you dive on a coral reef is an experience you will never forget.
sentences.cn: 第一次在珊瑚礁潜水是毕生难忘的经历。

sentences.en: The port had been attacked by German dive bombers for the past five days.
sentences.cn: 在过去的5天中，该港口一直受到德国俯冲轰炸机的攻击。

sentences.en: The Russians had to dive-bomb the cities to regain control.
sentences.cn: 俄国人必须俯冲轰炸那些城市才能重新获得控制权。

sentences.en: The submarine began to dive.
sentences.cn: 潜水艇开始下潜。

sentences.en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentences.cn: 这是我在撒丁岛附近的沉船残骸处潜水时所见的景象。

sentences.en: Unlike some birds, it does not dive vertically.
sentences.cn: 和一些鸟不一样, 这种鸟不垂直向下飞.

sentences.en: When the argument started I wanted to dive in.
sentences.cn: 争论开始时,我也想加入.

sentences.en: When you dive, you must keep your legs straight.
sentences.cn: 跳水时腿要伸直.

sentences.en: While on honeymoon in Bali, she learned to scuba dive.
sentences.cn: 她在巴厘岛度蜜月时学会了带水肺潜水.

sentences.en: You dive in first and test the temperature of the water.
sentences.cn: 你先跳入水中试试水温.

words.tran_cn: 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟

phrases.tran_cn: 开始大吃；头朝下跳入水中
v. 投入；把手伸入；钻研
头部朝下的俯冲；（价格等的）暴跌；一落千丈

trans.tran_en: a sudden movement in a particular direction or into a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 跳水，潜水，冲向，迅速将手伸入，暴跌
trans.tran_en: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first

trans.tran_cn: 跳水； 潜水；  俯冲
trans.tran_en: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first
to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first
